objective: IMPLEMENT SECURITY FIXES: Fix all CRITICAL and HIGH severity vulnerabilities identified in SECURITY_AUDIT.md. Priority order: 1) CRITICAL-01: Add DOMPurify sanitization for XSS prevention, 2) CRITICAL-02: Add input validation for all socket events, 3) CRITICAL-03: Add per-IP connection limits and memory cleanup, 4) HIGH-01 through HIGH-05: Rate limiting, CORS validation, CSP headers, input length checks, WebSocket origin validation. Test that the server still runs after changes. Commit each fix separately.
